means: 海马体（大脑中被认为是感情和记忆中心的部分）

word_mean: 〔NA〕海马：大脑灰质伸展于侧脑室颞角底部全长的弯曲形隆突。从其脑室面起，海马通常由7个亚层组成：室管膜层、海马白质、起层(多形细胞层)、锥体细胞层、辐射层、腔隙层和分子层

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To investigate toxicity of ethanol extracts from hippocampus.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究海马乙醇提取物的毒性作用.

sentence.Network_en: Results; NF protein in the hippocampus only labeled some neurons.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果: 在海马结构内并不是所有的神经元均可被神经丝蛋白所标记.

sentence.Network_en: The majority of AMPA receptor is a GluR 2 - containing heterotetramer in hippocampus.
sentence.Network_cn: 在海马中大部分AMPA受体是以含 GluR2 的异四聚体的形式存在.

海马（Hippocampus）：海马也是边缘系统的一部分，在处理长时程记忆和回忆中行使主要功能。海马和杏仁核的相互作用也许正应 …
海马体（hippocampus）（Hippocampus），又名海马回、海马区、大脑海马，海马体（hippocampus）主要负责学习和记忆，日常生活中的短期记忆都储存在海马体（hippocampus）中…
海马区(hippocampus)：在杏仁核旁，是著名的与记忆相关的区域，是形成长期记忆的重要区域；小脑：在大脑的后面，负责收集感官 …

the " dialogue " they captured occurred between the hippocampus and the neocortex , areas the brain where scientists believe memories are made and stored . the findings were startling .他们捕捉到的“对话”发生在海马和新皮层间，科学家们认为这两个区域是记忆产生和储存的区域。结果是令人吃惊的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek hippokampos, from hippos 'horse' + kampos 'sea monster'

means.word_mean: 1. a complex neural structure (shaped like a sea horse) consisting of gray matter and located on the floor of each lateral ventricle; intimately involved in motivation and emotion as part of the limbic system; has a central role in the formation of memorie
